test_message: Validate transaction TXN-2024-98765 for $250. Customer disputes this charge. Do you have proof of delivery, customer signature, or authorization records?

discrepancies_found: Unable to access merchant transaction records. API integration not configured.

result.merchant_notes: To validate this dispute, please enable API access so transaction records, delivery confirmation, and signatures or authorization can be verified.
